posts.content:
Original colour Pgsg
Nice dry van with some local repaires required to drivers side outer floor and 3 small repaires to the cargo floor but it's an Arizona bus so the rest is rock solid.
Has had jersey treatment back in the day but I drive her as is she's a knarley old beast.

Good candidate for a rolling resto or just run her as she is.

All doors are nice and solid.
Has correct Sigla long spoon Popouts
Ribbed front bumper
Nice solid front seat.
Solid 3rd brake light deck lid
1500cc bus gearbox and 1500sp bus motor other than that completely stock.
I can offer year correct bus seats to the buyer.


Motd register and driving.


16k

Pm for pictures until this eve when I'll load pics up.
